mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1981 Season
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the 1981 Barter Theatre season. Productions include: Fantasticks, April 16- May 9 | Home of the Brave, May 12-30 | Dulcy, June 3-21 | On Golden Pond, June 24- July 12 | Gallows Humor, July 1-26 | Arms and the Man, July 15- Aug 2 | Two by Five, July 29- Aug 23 | Deathtrap, Aug 5-23 | Talley's Folly, Aug 26- Sep 13 | Oh, Coward!, Sep 16- Oct 4.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
